description:
Form field to handle a time value.

Have a look at `<k-field>`, `<k-input>`
and `<k-time-input>` for additional information.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: help
props.description: Optional help text below the field

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID. The component `_uid` will be used as default.

props.name: label
props.description: A descriptive label for the field

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: after
props.description: Optional text that will be shown after the input

props.name: before
props.description: Optional text that will be shown before the input

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon used for the input (and times dropdown)

props.name: value
props.description: Value must be provided as ISO time string

props.name: max
props.description: The last allowed time as ISO time string

props.name: min
props.description: The first allowed time as ISO time string

props.name: display
props.description: Format to parse and display the time

props.name: step
props.description:
Rounding to the nearest step.
Requires an object with a `unit`
and a `size` key

props.name: times
props.description: Deactivate the times dropdown or not
